GSD.product_version: versions from v4.19 to before v5.4.211
GSD.description:
KVM: nVMX: Snapshot pre-VM-Enter DEBUGCTL for !nested_run_pending case

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.211 by commit e40bde8a28ed755f0306e320b80da2f32154dcdb, it was introduced in version v4.19 by commit 8fcc4b5923af5de58b80b53a069453b135693304. For more details please see the references link.
